original_title: On va nulle part et c'est très bien
overview: A steelworker leaves Lorraine with his family for Finland, his wife's country. On the way, they meet two zonards, one of whom falls in love with the proletarian's daughter. The other, his brother protector, a sort of philosophic brute, does not accept to abandon him.
title: On va nulle part et c'est très bien
